de.humatic.nmj

Class NetworkMidiInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiPort
      • de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiInput

  • public class NetworkMidiInput
extends NetworkMidiPort
    This class represents a MIDI input port. To get a NetworkMidiInput instance call openInput on the NetworkMidiSystem.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMidiListener(NetworkMidiListener ml)
      Adds a listener to be notified on incoming MIDI data.
      void close(NetworkMidiClient nmc)
      Removes the given client from the listener list and closes the input releasing the network resources it had allocated when no more listeners are present.
      void removeMidiListener(NetworkMidiListener ml)
      Removes a previously added listener.
      void setLink(NetworkMidiOutput nwmo, boolean attach)
      Used to directly hook up an output to this input, providing some sort of MIDI through functionality.

      • Methods inherited from class de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiPort

        getChannelIndex, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close(NetworkMidiClient nmc)
        Removes the given client from the listener list and closes the input releasing the network resources it had allocated when no more listeners are present. Use null to immediately remove all listeners and close the port.
        Overrides:
        close in class NetworkMidiPort

      • addMidiListener

        public void addMidiListener(NetworkMidiListener ml)
        Adds a listener to be notified on incoming MIDI data.

      • removeMidiListener

        public void removeMidiListener(NetworkMidiListener ml)
        Removes a previously added listener. When the last listener gets removed the Input will be closed.

      • setLink

        public void setLink(NetworkMidiOutput nwmo,
           boolean attach)
        Used to directly hook up an output to this input, providing some sort of MIDI through functionality.
        Parameters:
        nwmo - - the NetworkMIDIOutput to be linked
        attach - - whether to add or remove the link
